column1: Smoque BBQ////Eat in or order takeout. Everything was delicious. The brisket melts in your mouth. I didn't even need sauce
column2: it was so good. The St. Louis ribs smoked flavor was perfect. The sides were really good and not too heavy. The coleslaw was fresh. I loved that the cornbread had bits of corn in it and it wasn't too dry. The beans were also really good and light
column3: it had chunks of smoked meat in it.
